Helper macro for checking the result of an &#39;Expected&lt;T&gt;&#39;.

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="#aba4537291f20e29f5eb603d4aa06443c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;ERROR(Err, Matcher)                                        \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  EXPECT&#95;THAT(llvm::detail::TakeError(Err), Matcher)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="#ad7bc2bc11b917a1bb417405835893a67"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define ASSERT&#95;THAT&#95;ERROR(Err, Matcher)                                        \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  ASSERT&#95;THAT(llvm::detail::TakeError(Err), Matcher)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Helper macro for checking the result of an &#39;Expected&lt;T&gt;&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">///   @code&#123;.cpp&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="comment">///     // function to be tested</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="comment">///     Expected&lt;int&gt; myDivide(int A, int B);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">///     TEST(myDivideTests, GoodAndBad) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">///       // test good case</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">///       // if you only care about success or failure:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">///       EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED(myDivide(10, 5), Succeeded());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">///       // if you also care about the value:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">///       EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED(myDivide(10, 5), HasValue(2));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">///       // test the error case</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">///       EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED(myDivide(10, 0), Failed());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">///       // also check the error message</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">///       EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED(myDivide(10, 0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">///           FailedWithMessage(&quot;B must not be zero!&quot;));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">///     &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">///   @endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="#ad7631d96a0e84d84b35d854fdc88fd6f"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define EXPECT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED(Err, Matcher)                                     \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  EXPECT&#95;THAT(llvm::detail::TakeExpected(Err), Matcher)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191" lineLink="#ae499a548f28c1b29799aa10a45e57198"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define ASSERT&#95;THAT&#95;EXPECTED(Err, Matcher)                                     \\</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="preprocessor">  ASSERT&#95;THAT(llvm::detail::TakeExpected(Err), Matcher)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
